<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Urgent Upwelling](/Feats.aspx?ID=3031) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 249 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Wellspring Mage](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=104)

**Frequency**
once per 10 minutes

**Prerequisites**
[Wellspring Mage Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3029)

**Trigger**
An enemy reduces you to 0 HP, an enemy critically hits you, or you critically fail a saving throw against an enemy's effect.

</column>

---

Defeat lets you to tap into your wellspring. Attempt the flat check for [wellspring magic](/Rules.aspx?ID=1580). If you critically succeed, you can choose to forgo gaining a temporary spell slot to instead have the triggering enemy undergo a wellspring surge. This surge functions just as it would for you, the only difference being that it emits from the enemy.
name: Urgent Upwelling
